setting.value:
Today marks the [B][COLOR white]fifth anniversary[/COLOR][/B] of the launch of the launch of the [B][COLOR white]TV ADDONS[/COLOR][/B] (formerly XBMC HUB) community, home of the best unofficial addons for Kodi!
This also seems like an appropriate time to mention that we really need to upgrade our servers, so [B][COLOR white]please make a donation[/COLOR][/B] if you can afford it: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/donate/[/COLOR][/B]
We have a lot of exciting things planned for the coming weeks, including a fresh new design for our web site, and our new all-in-one Kodi tool. Stay tuned and check our site for updates!
